room_title: Escape room "Mission Matrix" by Cinergy’s Extreme Escape Room in Amarillo
room_description:
Sources have identified Cyrus Berringer, A.K.A. “Cyber” as the lone mastermind responsible for infiltrating a system which has not only granted him access to unlimited private information of every person on earth but also gives him control of government intelligence databases, including weapons and missile defense systems. Cyber is a recluse obsessed with technology. There’s no telling what he’s capable of. YOU must stop him!

Find his secret lair, break into his master computer and upload a virus that will crash Cyber’s mainframe once and for all.
